daniel_comprehensive_response.subject: The RegimA Group results and Computer Expense analysis

key_claims.claim: Kayla murdered August 2023
key_claims.context: Cards expired 2 weeks after Kayla's murder in Aug 2023

key_claims.claim: Emergency measure - expenses on Worldwide cards
key_claims.context: RegimA Skin Treatments and Strategic have no record of computer expenses

key_claims.claim: ReZonance made first annual profit Feb 2023
key_claims.context: Kayla and Daniel celebrated after decade of work

key_claims.claim: ReZonance owes Daniel ZAR 1.8 million
key_claims.context: Director loans from investments over the years

key_claims.claim: Pete insisted Daniel close ReZonance
key_claims.context: Daniel firmly rejected this demand

key_claims.claim: Murder investigation - freeze all activity
key_claims.context: Authorities instructed freeze while investigating

key_claims.claim: Worldwide absorbed 4 distribution partners overhead (2020-2023)
key_claims.context: Daniel single-handedly rebuilt demand side

key_claims.claim: Rynette took all payments into account only she has access to
key_claims.context: Denied Daniel visibility while leaving expenses with him

key_claims.claim: Rynette is neither director nor employee of Worldwide
key_claims.context: Yet has complete control without liability

key_claims.claim: Turnover increase: 2M → 12M → 19M
key_claims.context: Reflects additional distribution activity

key_claims.claim: Drop to 18M after Pete became administrator
key_claims.context: Pete signed affidavit, unhooked automations
key_claims.significance: Revenue decline after Pete took control

key_claims.claim: Pete and Rynette broke automations despite warning
key_claims.context: Daniel warned not to touch or it would break

key_claims.claim: Bank contacted Daniel about Pete/Rynette mandate changes
key_claims.context: Attempted to change ownership, close accounts, cancel cards

key_claims.claim: Daniel informed bank these were errors
key_claims.context: All without Daniel's knowledge or consent

key_claims.claim: ReZonance invoices with 10% mark-up
key_claims.context: Itemized billing with R50 processing fee

key_claims.claim: After Aug 2023 all allocated to FNB auto feed
key_claims.context: No more itemized ReZonance invoices
key_claims.significance: Loss of proper accounting after Kayla's death

key_claims.claim: RegimA SA and Zone use trust accounts
key_claims.context: Structured to prevent Pete taking revenue

key_claims.claim: Pete did to Kachan what he's doing to Daniel
key_claims.context: Simply taking revenue by instructing payments to another account

key_claims.claim: Moving assets between companies is theft
key_claims.context: Different ownership structures, not subsidiaries

key_claims.claim: Outstanding R1M+ owed to ReZonance (Feb 2023)
key_claims.context: RegimA Skin Treatments debt to ReZonance

key_claims.claim: Rynette made debt disappear in 2024
key_claims.context: Misallocated GoDaddy payments as ReZonance payments

key_claims.claim: ReZonance never received the payments
key_claims.context: Amounts still outstanding despite allocation

key_claims.claim: Will flag as fraudulent with SARS
key_claims.context: Mismatch between companies' records

key_claims.claim: Pete never seen actual accounts
key_claims.context: Nor has Jacqui, nor has Daniel

key_claims.claim: Accounts exist solely on Rynette's computer
key_claims.context: Nobody else able to see them

key_claims.claim: Amounts going through Strategic and RST seem off the charts
key_claims.context: Need internal audit with extreme urgency

bantjes_response.action: Away for 2 weeks, little/no access to communications

smoking_gun_evidence: Rynette controls all accounts despite not being director/employee
Rynette made R1M+ debt disappear through fraudulent allocation
Pete attempted unauthorized banking changes
Pattern of theft (Kachan precedent)
Accounts exist only on Rynette's computer
ReZonance never received payments allocated to it

popia_violation.legal_impact: POPIA violation, evidence of revenue diversion
